tool_description: This is an API which provides different types of data on Covid-19, like vaccination statistics and infected people.
name: Covid News and Statistics
title: Covid News and Statistics

api_list.name: country
api_list.description: Provides general statistics for the country specified in the endpoint.

api_list.name: deaths/{country}
api_list.description: Provides mortality statistics for the country specified in the endpoint

api_list.name: deaths
api_list.description: Provides mortality statistics from countries all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news-and-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/deaths"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news-and-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: cases/{country}
api_list.description: Provides new cases statistics from the country specified in the endpoint

api_list.name: cases
api_list.description: Provides new cases statistics from countries all over the world

api_list.name: news
api_list.description: Provides latest news from some of the most popular and trusted news sources

optional_parameters.name: limitTo
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of returned article items to the specified value.
